about

hi, i’m matt. i’m a ux/product designer who’s been working in the digital medium since 2010.

currently, I’m doing product design for internal tools @ vox media. when I’m not thinking about bad dark patterns or modular design elements i enjoy baking and lounging around with my cat, χ.

any questions please reach out otherwise enjoy the limited selection of work below.
